mapper.insert: insert into PublicProvinceCity (ID, Name, Code, ParentCode, Jibie, LowerAcronym, UpperAcronym, LowerFullPinyin) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{parentcode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{jibie,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{loweracronym,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{upperacronym,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{lowerfullpinyin,jdbcType=NVARCHAR})
mapper.select:
select p.code ProvinceCode, p.name ProvinceName, c.code CityCode, c.name CityName, d.code DistrictCode, d.name DistrictName, d.IsPublic, d.IsHot from PublicProvinceCity d with ( nolock ) join PublicProvinceCity c with ( nolock ) on d.ParentCode = c.code join PublicProvinceCity p with ( nolock ) on c.ParentCode = p.code where d.jibie=4
and c.name like '%${cityName}%'
